item.title: Hello Ember Js
item.description: This is my first post in this year. Recently we have to develop a project about teacher training for a private university in Mexico City. There are a lot of javascript frameworks and transpilers: Angular JS, Vue JS, Meteor, Aurelia JS, React JS, Ionic JS, Typescript, CoffeeScript, Elm, etc. We decided learn and use Ember JS for develop our frontend, and Spring/Groovy for the backend. About Ember Js Ember is a JavaScript front-end framework designed to help you build websites with rich and complex user interactions.
